content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production (Position 0,0 and 2,0)
Two furnaces dedicated to producing iron plates:
- Furnace 1 at (0,0) with coal fuel (24) and no ingredients
- Furnace 2 at (2,0) with coal fuel (25) and no ingredients
Both furnaces are idle due to lack of ingredients

### Copper Plate Production (Position 4,4 and 6,4)
Two furnaces dedicated to producing copper plates:
- Furnace 3 at (4,4) with coal fuel (28) and no ingredients
- Furnace 4 at (6,4) with coal fuel (28) and no ingredients
Both furnaces are idle due to lack of ingredients

### Power Generation System (Position -7.5, 18.5)
Complete power generation setup consisting of:
- Steam engine at (-7.5, 18.5), working status, containing 200 steam at 165°
- Boiler at (-7.5, 22.0), working with 4 coal, containing water (199.99) and steam (199.93)
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5), working status, containing water (99.93)
- Connected pipe groups:
  - Steam pipes at (-7.5, 15.5)
  - Empty pipes at (-7.5, 20.5)
  - Water pipes at (-8.5, 23.5)
- Electricity distribution network with multiple poles covering areas from (-2.5,7.5) to (7.5,21.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Lab Placement Errors
- Multiple failed attempts to place lab at different coordinates due to [processing] error
- Ensure the target location is clear of other entities before placing lab
- Verify you have lab in inventory before attempting to place it
- Check if the placement area is within buildable terrain

### Resource and Inventory Management
- Monitor coal levels in boiler to prevent fuel depletion
- Keep track of wood supply for crafting electric poles
- Ensure required materials are in inventory before crafting (especially for complex items like labs)

### Entity Access Errors
- Verify entity existence at specified coordinates before attempting to access
- When accessing lab entity, ensure proper position coordinates are used
- Use proper error handling when entities are not found at expected locations

### Crafting Prerequisites
- Check inventory for all required materials before starting crafting chains
- For small electric poles, ensure sufficient wood and copper cables
- When crafting labs, verify all components (transport belts, iron gear wheels, electronic circuits) are available

### Power Connection Issues
- Ensure small electric poles are available in inventory before attempting connections
- Verify connection points are within range of existing power network
- Keep track of power pole placement to maintain continuous network coverage
